name: Gobs of Ghosts Beta Test
description:
Conquer the classic arcade action of Gobs of Ghosts!

This is a quick 2 level demo of the game.  It will just end after level 2.  The game should be released in 2 weeks for free here on itch, and ad supported on android.

Controls-

Arrows - Move

Control - Shoot

Shift - Jump

Space - Switch current weapon
